name: Aulia Adhayatmik Anusandhan Kendra Aulia Darbar
briefDescription: Despite vast resources and rich cultural heritage the socio-economic condition of the rural areas of vaishali is still very poor. This haunted the minds of a group of development oriented persons, who always used to uplift the society-economic condition of the people of the rural areas after sometimes they came into contact with other like minded people and devided to something for the enlistment of poor in the society. Thus, the organization “Aulia Adhayatmik Anusandhan Kendra Aulia Darbar” cam into existence in 1976. It was established in such a time when many social spiritual, economical and education problem were on the peak prevalent in the society.
